entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is described as demanding and accusatory in his tone. He points at Cho's robes and asks if she supports the Tornados.

entities.name: cho
entities.description: Cho is described as cool and confident when responding to Ron's questions. She mentions that she has supported the Tornados since she was six years old.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as observing Ron's behavior and tone towards Cho.

entities.name: tornados
entities.description: The Tornados are described as a team that has started winning the league. Cho mentions that she supports them since she was six years old.

relationships.description: Ron accuses Cho of supporting the Tornados, but Cho responds coolly and confidently.
Harry observes Ron's behavior towards Cho and Hermione's reaction to it.
